Sentencas: An efficient and stable NiO-8YSZ hydrogen electrode for solid oxide cells (SOCs) is vital in the context of increasing global intermittent renewable energy sources.
Titulo: Rational Design of NiO-8YSZ Screen-Printing Slurry for High- Performance Large-Area Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Most fundamental studies of SOCs have been carried out using button cells with small active areas, whereas the screen-printing of NiO8YSZ hydrogen electrodes required for large-area SOCs have been ignored.
Titulo: Rational Design of NiO-8YSZ Screen-Printing Slurry for High- Performance Large-Area Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: In this study, we provide an alternative method for designing a highly active and stable fuel electrode for SOCs application by improving the slurry dispersant effect.
Titulo: Rational Design of NiO-8YSZ Screen-Printing Slurry for High- Performance Large-Area Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: The dispersion states and stabilities of NiO-8YSZ screen-printing slurries were quantitatively analyzed using the instability index, relaxation time, and viscosity.
Titulo: Rational Design of NiO-8YSZ Screen-Printing Slurry for High- Performance Large-Area Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy images of the resultant films indicate that the microstructure can be improved by optimizing the dispersants within the ink.
Titulo: Rational Design of NiO-8YSZ Screen-Printing Slurry for High- Performance Large-Area Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of the resulting SOCs with optimized hydrogen electrode microstructures was examined at a 5 x 5 cm2 scale (16 cm2 active area).
Titulo: Rational Design of NiO-8YSZ Screen-Printing Slurry for High- Performance Large-Area Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Single cells delivered a peak power density of 0.57 W center dot cm-2 at 750 degrees C in fuel cell mode and had a high current density of -0.81
Titulo: Rational Design of NiO-8YSZ Screen-Printing Slurry for High- Performance Large-Area Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: A center dot cm-2 at 1.30 V in electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Rational Design of NiO-8YSZ Screen-Printing Slurry for High- Performance Large-Area Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: These results highlight the potential for large-scale high-performance SOCs production by designing NiO-8YSZ electrode nanostructures via a proper dispersant with the stability of screen-printing paste.
Titulo: Rational Design of NiO-8YSZ Screen-Printing Slurry for High- Performance Large-Area Solid Oxide Cells
